extendedInfo.description: Take your social gaming to a completely new level with Pirates of the Caribbean!Master of the Seas is the first mobile game to combine deep story and brilliant graphics with compelling social gameplay. Become a pirate as you create your ship, build your crew, and embark on quests wrapped around the lore from the Pirates of the Caribbean universe. â¢ Invite friends to join your crew, the bigger your crew the stronger you are! â¢ Battle other pirates to gain rewards and increase your standing. â¢ Buy cannons, weapons, amulets, and equipment to upgrade your ship. â¢ Explore exotic islands, buy properties, and complete quests to earn gold and experience. Only the savviest pirates know when to plunder rivals, engage friends, and chart a course to become a legend â The Master of the Seas! Look for Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides on Disney Blu-rayâ¢ and DVD Combo Pack!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/Disney-branded app Privacy Policy:  http://corporate.disney.go.com/corporate/pp.html

reviews.comment: I love this game and I am very thankful to disney for producing this terrific and luminous game I love this game at all for my sanding galaxy s4\tWorld precius thankyou to disney
reviews.author: Vijay Sehrawat

reviews.comment: Excellent game to pass small or larger amounts of time.  Gems are hard to acquire but are worth the wait.  They really boost your stats when using them at the stores.  Our you can but lots of them with real money.  Overall great game.\tExcellent game to pass small or larger amounts of time.  Gems are hard to acquire but are worth the wait.  They really boost your stats when using them at the stores.  Our you can but lots of them with real money.  Overall great game.
reviews.author: Steve Ward

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Is a really good game. A great way to pass time. Add jonnyyy5 to your crew. Put in code h4c7v6 to get reward
reviews.author: jonathan whittingham

reviews.title: Great entertainment!
reviews.comment: I enjoy playing a few times a day. It doesn\'t take up a lot of my time, if I don\'t want it to. From searching for treasure, to battling other pirate ships and funny quests. It\'s great fun. From time to time they throw in a major quest into the mix, just to keep us on our toes.
reviews.author: Erik Shiley

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: Please add: brownsugasoiree. I gift daily.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update is terrible
reviews.comment: Since, I have downloaded it, whenever I use my gold to buy offensive or defensive weapons, it subtracks the  gold but does not give me the weapons. What is the point of the game if you cannot buy weapons and use them. It also makes it hard to find opponants that are too strong or to week.
reviews.author: Matt Helm

reviews.title: Capt Recoj
reviews.comment: Hi ya from Tampa Fl., again great game my whole family playing it. but why is it that when I get a message that one of my crew mate has been attacked and request that I average them it won\'t take me too that screen.  I would most like too average my crew mate. Please can you make this happen.   Thanks Tampa Florida
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Really good graphics cool its a addictive game   Awesome
reviews.author: Kiley Lopez

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: I don\'t like when I get in a trap that I have no choice but to fight or reset my phone.  When I bury treasure, I have to keep checking like very 20 minutes, or it can be stolen. That\'s not real. It would be nice if I could bring up directions, and rules of the game voluntary, instead of being surprised with them.
reviews.author: Chris Voice

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: I love this game. Add RedDog_oShea to your team! It has a lot of great features and awesome graphics! I like the way it allows you to choose how to what path to take to find queues.
reviews.author: Todd McDaniel

reviews.title: Best game I\'ve played!
reviews.comment: This game is so much fun! It really is addicting!! Make your ship stronger by adding more to your crew! Add PRIVATEER4978391 to your crew!! I gift daily :) see you on the seas!
reviews.author: kylie yanagihara

reviews.title: ryanrajeh and K4J0T4 for 20 gems
reviews.comment: Working fine now except for the full energy notifications;still not working....level 200 and moving up ..I gift back similar items ..energy for energy and  weapons for same when I can. This latest competition is totally stupid; dont even try it unless u are level 201 and u got 2000 plus energy to waste on each island .   my  user name :     ryanrajeh
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GEMS!!
reviews.comment: You are gonna need em!  Here be a code to get 20 free!  Click on the wrench, click on \'Promotional Code\' GO!  Enter this code \'S2C5Y6\'  Woo Hoo!  Hope this helps you out!  PS:Go into account management and save your email address so that you can reinstall the app without losing your stuff!
reviews.author: Mork RS

reviews.title: Pretty kool
reviews.comment: Think its a pretty awesome game, and you dont have to spend real money to progress. Would love to see ship battle progress further though, maybe more shooting options or possibly top down view and actually sailing the way youd like to. Even that doesnt bring the game down any. Just would really like to see more options in battle. In short, mos def worth playin
reviews.author: elizabeth lambert

reviews.title: Requires more challenges
reviews.comment: First 100 levels are good and interesting. After that there is no challenges and its only killing the time.design and music is good

But otherwise so far a great game and love to play it

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It\'s a really great game. The battle system us easy to use and is pretty straightforward. By the way added me, I\'m alpha_pirate.

reviews.title: Best of its genre!
reviews.comment: Wonderfully designed game! 1st class graphics (eye candy) & sounds, along with its manual battles, give it replay value. APPLAUSE!!!
